page.title: 05EDUCATION IN HOLYMOORSIDE
page.content: In Holymoorside there is a primary and a junior school. These cater for children upto the age of 11. The school is an integral part of the village community. At 11 the children go to a junior high school. This school is just outside our area. It is called{Manor {School}and is on Old Road in Chesterfield. When the children reach the age of 13, under the{Doncaster {System}the parents can choose to transfer their children to one of the senior high schools. {Chesterfield Sen. High}is for the boys only. It is situated at{Brookside and many Holymoorside parents choose it because it has a sixth form and it is nearer than Manor. The school has excellent facilities, including an all weather running track and an indoor swimming pool.
